name: Uphill Bus Driving Challenge
description:
Become the king of the road in this Uphill Bus Driving Challenge game and drive around the climb very steep hills and mountains to reach to your destinations and get reward. The passengers in the bus depend on you to drive them to the right location on time. Drive across amazing uphill road and Take sharp turns and also try to follow traffic rules while doing this. while reverse parking your bus because the bus is a very big vehicle and it has to be driven with precision and expertise.

Uphill Bus Driving Challenge: Features:

3D Game-play.
Smooth and Responsive Controls
Thrilling missions.
Easy and Smooth Controls of the buses.
Realistic Offroad Experience.
Bus Stop to Pick and Drop Passengers
